definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine

sentences.english: The windows glinted in the sun.
And somewhere shining snow polished by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 某處被風拋光的雪閃耀着光芒。

sentences.english: It glittered in the gigantic sky.
Their bayonets glanced in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 他們的刺刀在陽光下閃耀。

sentences.english: Standing on the bridge, he could see the river waves sparkling in the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 站在橋上，他可以看見河水在月光下閃耀。

sentences.english: Glows and grows in the murk of his brain.
sentences.chinese: 在他陰暗沉鬱的腦海裏閃耀亮光。

sentences.english: The sun transform the gild cupola into dazzling point of light.
sentences.chinese: 太陽將這些鍍金的圓屋頂變成了閃耀的光點。

sentences.english: What shines and glitters in the king's hall?
sentences.chinese: 是什麼正在大廳中閃耀照人？

sentences.english: Her dress went well with the brilliant lights.
sentences.chinese: 她的打扮與閃耀的燈光正好相配。

sentences.english: The fallow fields glitter like water indeed.
sentences.chinese: 休耕地似水面波光閃耀。

sentences.english: The sun shines with a dazzling light.
The steel in the canal water feature transforms into a cobalt blue glow.
sentences.chinese: 水道景觀中的鋼鐵在夜晚閃耀着美麗的鈷藍色輝光。

sentences.english: I think my lucky stars everyday for everything that I have.
sentences.chinese: 我想我的幸運星每天都在爲我做的一切閃耀。

sentences.english: Sparkly copper, shimmery and flashy like a bonfire in May.
sentences.chinese: 閃閃發光的銅色，像五月的篝火般閃耀。

sentences.english: The personality shines through and completely captivates his audience.
sentences.chinese: 那些閃耀的人格完全迷惑了他的聽衆。

sentences.english: Take advantage of  precious opportunities while they still sparkle before you.
sentences.chinese: 當它在你面前閃耀時，抓住這寶貴的機會。

definition: to illuminate/to turn on the lights/to light (a blaze)

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
